attributes.review: this app asked for tons of personal info like my phone number, email, and address, and my phone basically broke from all of the messages! constant phone calls, text messages, and emails from this app and i could barely use my phone because of it. thoroughly dissatisfied, so much spam!😡
attributes.title: disappointed as a republican😔🇺🇸

attributes.review: The phone number is problematic, screw it we all know why we’re actually leaving these reviews.
attributes.title: Horrible app! I absolutely do not recommend!

attributes.review: awful app. was spammed with texts and calls all day long from the trump campaign. i had to unsubscribe because it was too much. what a shame
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Right when I downloaded to see what this was I saw it wanted my number and no I wasn’t gonna give it my number that’s weird why would you want my number! 😑🤦🏻‍♀️Im not dumb so no
attributes.title: Etto(um) no

attributes.review: DO NOT USE THIS APP!!! IT’S A SCAM! AS SOON AS I OPENED THE APP IT ASKED FOR MY CREDIT CARD INFO! That was the first red flag later in I tried to turn of the app and it froze on my screen ALL NIGHT! I know it wasn’t something wrong with my phone because I seen MANYYY similar reviews!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I was scrolling through the app and then it said that there was a game so i tried to play the game and then it crashed my phone and so I had to factory reset my phone!!!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: Worst App of All Time!!!

attributes.review: The app was going out of control! It kept on glitching and many viruses popped up! I had to delete immediately. I was really looking forward to supporting this dusty cheeto further. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.😡😡
attributes.title: Terrible!😡

attributes.review: Right off the bat they want my phone number. I don’t think so! Really slow. Don’t they have any tech guys on their team?? Don’t waste your time.
attributes.title: Is this legit?

attributes.review: I decided to download this app because I wanted to stand with our president but honestly... I hate it!! The way it updates me on things is quite annoying AND his political views are SOOO IRRATIONAL!!! Truly disappointed 😔
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!

attributes.review:
awful app, awful person. only downloaded so i could write a review and get this racist rapists app off the app store. come on gen z we got this. he has no clue what we can do to him. let’s get a few more tulsa incidents up in here. we can mess him up so badly we just haven’t chosen to do it yet

everyone deserves human rights ✨😝💕 except trump 🧚🏻‍♀️💞😆
attributes.title: get this app removed from the app store
